Articles.Content:
So I created this space station with nine attachment points for the various modules.  So far I have been able to build 7 different modules for this thing, but I need some help filling up the last two slots.  What am I missing?

I would appreciate any suggestions you might have.

Starting at the top and moving clockwise: 

  1. Science experiments/scanner
  2. Science Lab
  3. Living Quarters
  4. Command and Control
  5. Communications
  6. Refinery
  7. Power station
  8. ???
  9. ???

What about a fuel store? And an escape pod?

BTW, cool station!

Edited December 7, 2016 by qzgy
Good suggestion!  I shall add an Escape module.  The fuel is already there with all the central tanks.
The escape module is done.  You can find it on KerbalX along with all the other stuff:  Get the MR-Emergency module
Am I missing crew quarters, or do the escape pods have more crew capacity than the rest of the station?

The Habitation module supports 12 Kerbals and the Command module supports 5.  I think the escape system should be plenty.

You should be able to see both modules as well as the Communication module on the right side of the station.
